Title: Patek Philippe & Co.  Stainless Steel Wristwatch.
Subtitle: Antique 118 years Years Old Movement in New Case.
Description: Movement: Patek Philippe & Co.(100% Authenticity guaranteed) Serial Number: 107766 Case : New stainless steel. Case Diameter : 47.5 mm. Crystal Type : Domed,mineral glass. Dial : Restored.Strap: Leather For Your attention great looking man's wrist watch converted from pocket watch with high grade PATEK PHILIPPE & Co. pocket watch chronometer movement. New stainless steel case with crystal back recently made for this wonderful movement. The diameter of the watch is 47.5 millimeters and 56 millimeters from lug to lug and 14.5 millimeters thick. Professionally restored dial with black Arabic numerals signed PATEK PHILIPPE & Cie, GENEVA. is in perfect condition. Stem wind/set movement is signed Pat.Jan13.1891 – ADJUSTED - PATEK PHILIPPE & Co, GENEVA, SUISSE – E,Marks TROY,N.Y. The serial number 107766 dates this movement to the year of 1899. High grade rhodiumed and stripe decorated 18 jewels movement has wolf teeth winding gears, counter poised " moustache" lever, bimetallic compensating balance wheel with gold screws, Breguet overcoil balance spring . Watch is serviced and oiled and is in good working condition and keeps good time. The watch comes in a new wooden display box with a new 22 mm black leather strap.
